definition: to keep/to contain/to suck (keep in your mouth without chewing)

sentences.english: Ca-containing Endohedral Metallofullerenes were synthesized by DC arc discharge method.
sentences.chinese: 利用直流电弧法，合成了含钙的富勒烯金属包合物。

sentences.english: Ilvaite is a rare mineral of calcium-iron-bearing silicate.
sentences.chinese: 黑柱石是一种少见的含钙铁硅酸盐矿物。

sentences.english: It is apparent that humans can adjust to variations in the amount of calcium in their diet.
sentences.chinese: 显然，人体可以根据饮食含钙量的不同自发调节。

sentences.english: In fact, according to the quiz, less fattening versions of milk contain 30 milligrams more calcium.
sentences.chinese: 事实上，测试结果证明低脂牛奶含钙量要多30毫克。

sentences.english: Antacids and some other medicines that contain calcium also block iron absorption.
sentences.chinese: 抗酸制剂或是其他含钙的药物同样会阻止铁的吸收。

sentences.english: Gehlenite is the major constituent in the gasification residue of raw char.
sentences.chinese: 原煤焦气化残渣中主要含钙铝黄长石。

sentences.english: It was a little low on calcium and a little high in saturated fat.
sentences.chinese: 含钙有点低而饱和脂肪有点高。

sentences.english: Calcium compounds could decrease fluoride emission rate from montmorillonite.
sentences.chinese: 含钙化合物能降低氟从蒙脱石中的逸出率。

sentences.english: Yes, more exercise, the eat more calcium.
sentences.chinese: 可以的，多锻炼下，吃点含钙多的。

sentences.english: So to choose the high calcium and good solubility of calcium.
sentences.chinese: 所以要选择含钙高和溶解度好的钙。
